why.caption: Built for Developers
why.title: Why Choose Basestack?
why.description: Basestack gives you the tools to build faster and smarter. Focus on creating, not maintaining infrastructure. You can self-host or use our hosted solution.

open.title: Open Source Flexibility
open.description: Host it yourself for full control, or let us handle the hosting. It's your choice and your stack.

scale.title: Scalable for Every Stage
scale.description: From solo developers to growing teams, Basestack scales with you, no matter your size.

learning.title: Simple Setup
learning.description: Start quickly with tools that fit seamlessly into your workflow—no complicated setup or learning curve.

who.caption: Teams of All Sizes
who.title: Who It's Built For
who.description: Basestack works for developers at any level. Our tools adapt to your needs whether you're a solo developer, growing team, or established company.

solo.title: Solo Developers
solo.description: Build projects quickly with simple, customizable tools that grow with you.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Improve teamwork and productivity with tools that scale as you grow.

startups.title: Startups
startups.description: Develop and scale your business with a stack that adapts to your needs.

enterprises.title: Enterprises
enterprises.description: Simplify complex workflows with secure, scalable solutions for large organizations.

how-it-works.caption: Start in Minutes
how-it-works.title: How It Works
how-it-works.description: Start with Basestack in minutes. Pick your tools, set up quickly, and build right away—no hassle. The process is simple and adapts to your needs, whether you're working solo or with a team.

one.title: Choose Your Tools
one.description: Pick from our tools like Forms, Feature Flags, and more, depending on what your project needs. Whether it's managing releases or gathering feedback, we've got you covered.

two.title: Set Up Quickly
two.description: Set up in no time. You can self-host for full control or use our hosted solution for a simpler experience. Both options are designed to grow with you.

three.title: Build and Scale
three.description: Integrate Basestack’s tools into your workflow and start building. As your project grows, easily expand your stack and add more tools to keep up with your goals.

use-cases.caption: Practical Solutions
use-cases.title: Use Cases
use-cases.description: See how Basestack helps developers, teams, and startups. From managing user submissions to feature releases, our tools solve everyday challenges with ease.

forms.one: A small business collects customer inquiries with automatic replies without server setup needed.
forms.two: An event organizer gathers signups and files, then exports to CSV for easy planning.
forms.three: A researcher collects survey responses and tracks participation with real time analytics.
forms.four: A marketer captures leads and redirects users to a custom thank you page after submission.

flags.one: A startup releases features to specific user groups without redeploying their code.
flags.two: A dev team quickly disables problematic features with one click during updates.
flags.three: A product team tests two feature versions to see which performs better with users.
flags.four: A team hides unfinished features in production until they're ready for release.

community.caption: Collaborate and Grow
community.title: Join the Basestack Community
community.description: Join a network of developers, contribute to open-source projects, and help shape the future of tools for startups.

enterprise.caption: Basestack for Enterprise
enterprise.title: Build Smarter with Basestack
enterprise.description: Get a dedicated, private Basestack instance. Scale easily, customize authentication to meet your security needs, and accelerate development with enterprise-grade reliability.

contact.caption: Basestack for Business
contact.title: Talk to Our Sales Team
contact.description: Learn how Basestack can improve your development workflow. Book a demo and try out an Enterprise account to see our scalable solutions in action.

hero.title: Unlock Precision Control with Feature Flags
hero.description: Speed up your development with Feature Flags. Deploy faster, test smarter, and roll out safely. Control features in real time and reduce risks without disrupting users.

features.caption: Confident Control
features.title: Feature Flags That Power Your Workflow
features.description: Simplify deployments and manage feature releases with complete control. Feature Flags let you roll out features safely, track changes, and roll back instantly—without disrupting user experience.

one.title: Manage Multiple Projects
one.description: Easily handle feature releases across different projects and environments.
one.alt: A control panel showing multiple projects and environments with intuitive feature flag management controls.

two.title: Full Control Over Flags
two.description: Monitor and track changes effortlessly with powerful management tools.
two.alt: A feature flag dashboard with clear, concise data and easy-to-use management controls.

three.title: Instant Feature Adjustments
three.description: Update feature settings on the fly, with no redeploy necessary.
three.alt: A configuration interface for dynamically adjusting feature flags in real-time.

card.caption: Smart Rollouts
card.title: Feature Flags in Action
card.description: See how Basestack Feature Flags enhance efficiency, scalability, and transparency in your development workflow.

projects.label: Organization
projects.title: Stay Organized with Projects
projects.description: Group your feature flags by project to keep things organized. Makes it easy to manage flags for each project and track changes.
projects.alt: Illustration of flags organized within a project dashboard.

history.label: Transparency
history.title: Track Every Change
history.description: See who changed which flags and when. Helps your team stay on the same page and track all changes.
history.alt: History log showing detailed feature flag activity.

remote-config.label: Flexibility
remote-config.title: Adjust Settings On the Fly
remote-config.description: Update flags in real-time without redeploying your code. Perfect for quick changes and A/B testing.
remote-config.alt: Diagram showing remote adjustments for feature flag settings.

environments.label: Scalability
environments.title: Manage Across Environments
environments.description: Manage flags across dev, staging, and production environments. Makes testing and deployment easier as you scale.
environments.alt: Visual of flags syncing across multiple environments.

security.label: Security
security.title: Protect Your Features
security.description: Keep your flags safe with access controls and IP blocking. Prevents unauthorized changes and keeps your product secure.
security.alt: Shield icon representing security for feature flags.

more-features.caption: Full Control
more-features.title: Feature Flags, Full Toolkit
more-features.description: Get all the tools you need to manage feature flags. Control deployments and scale with confidence using toggles and multi-environment testing.

history.title: Track Flag Changes
history.description: See who toggled a flag and when, all in one view.

rollbacks.title: Instant Rollbacks
rollbacks.description: Disable features with a single click, no code changes needed.

bootstrapping.title: Instant Activation
bootstrapping.description: Activate flags instantly on page load for quick updates.

admin.title: Manage Flag Access
admin.description: Set role-based permissions to control who can edit flags.

sdks.title: SDK & API Integration
sdks.description: Easily integrate with our SDKs or use the API for custom setups.

environment.title: Sync Across Environments
environment.description: Manage flags smoothly across dev, staging, and production environments.

security.title: Secure Access Control
security.description: Block unwanted sources and ensure secure flag management.

sdks.caption: Easy Integration
sdks.title: SDKs Built for Your Stack
sdks.description: Quickly add Feature Flags to your apps with SDKs for popular languages and frameworks. Use our code snippets or API for full control, and customize your workflow as needed.

react.title: React & NextJS
react.description: Toggle features easily in React or NextJS apps with a simple SDK.

js.title: JavaScript & NodeJS
js.description: Add Feature Flags to your JS or NodeJS project with minimal setup.

api.title: API Reference
api.description: Build custom integrations with our flexible API.

why.caption: Boost Development
why.title: Still Unsure About Feature Flags?
why.description: Feature flags give developers control over feature releases and behavior, allowing for more flexibility and safer deployments.

benefits.title: Key Benefits of Feature Flags
benefits.description: Feature flags let you control system behavior dynamically, without changing the core code, making releases more reliable.

implementation.title: Cut Down on Implementation Debt
implementation.description: Toggle features on or off easily, enabling gradual rollouts and skipping unfinished code without major changes.

branching.title: Feature Flags vs. Branching
branching.description: Feature flags speed up development by separating feature management from code deployment, reducing merge conflicts.

banner.caption: Control Releases
banner.title: Ready to Ship Your Code?
banner.description: Basestack Feature Flags makes deploying and managing features simple, so you can ship your code safely and with confidence.

hero.title: Simplify Forms, Amplify Results
hero.description: Collect form submissions easily with our no-code solution. Basestack Forms handles the data securely so you can focus on what matters.

features.caption: Simplify
features.title: Explore Our Top Forms Features
features.description: Basestack Forms is easy to set up, customize, and secure—perfect for developers who want simple form management.

one.title: Centralized Form Management
one.description: Manage all your forms from a single, organized dashboard.

two.title: Fast Setup Process

three.title: Built-in Security
three.description: Protect your forms with access controls and data security tools.
three.alt: Visual showing security settings applied to a form.

more-features.caption: Centralize
more-features.title: Centralize Your Form Management
more-features.description: Manage all your forms in one place as your needs grow.

inbox.title: Submissions Hub
inbox.description: View, organize, and share form submissions from a centralized inbox.

uploads.title: File Storage (Coming Soon)
uploads.description: Store and manage files and images submitted via forms securely.

responses.title: Automatic Replies (Coming Soon)
responses.description: Send automatic follow-up emails to users after form submission.

redirects.title: Redirect Control
redirects.description: Guide users to custom success or error pages after they submit a form.

sharing.title: Team Access (Coming Soon)
sharing.description: Collaborate easily by sharing forms and submissions with team members or clients.

templates.title: Email Templates (Coming Soon)
templates.description: Create custom HTML templates for automated email responses.

analytics.title: Performance Insights (Coming Soon)
analytics.description: Track form performance, including traffic and conversion metrics.

export.title: Data Downloads
export.description: Export form submissions to CSV or JSON for detailed analysis.

builder.title: Form Builder (Coming Soon)
builder.description: Easily design and customize forms with our intuitive drag and drop builder.

spam.title: Spam Filter
spam.description: Automatically detect and block unwanted spam submissions.

guide.caption: Simple Integration
guide.title: Flexible Integration for Any Workflow
guide.description: Easily integrate Basestack Forms with your projects using simple methods. Whether you're working with HTML, JavaScript, or Next.js, you can get started in minutes.

html.title: HTML Integration
html.description: Simply set your form's action to our endpoint and start collecting submissions without hassle.

js.title: JavaScript Integration
js.description: Add custom form logic using JavaScript with minimal setup—perfect for dynamic features.

next.title: Next.js Ready
next.description: Seamlessly integrate Basestack Forms using Fetch or Axios in React or Next.js projects.

banner.title: Ready to Simplify Your Forms?
banner.description: Start using Basestack Forms today and build smarter, faster forms with ease. Create your free account now and take control of your form management.

why.caption: Custom Forms
why.title: Create Forms, Your Way
why.description: Basestack Forms works with your existing setup. Create and scale forms without needing extra frameworks or tools.

html.title: Effortless HTML Forms
html.description: Simply point your form's action to our endpoint without any server-side code required.

javascript.title: Streamlined JavaScript Forms
javascript.description: Use Basestack Forms with JavaScript to create custom forms with full frontend control.

api.title: Powerful Forms API
api.description: Create and manage forms directly through our API for complete control.

pricing.caption: Plans
pricing.title: Flexible Pricing for Developers & Teams
pricing.description: Choose a plan that fits your needs—whether you're an individual developer or part of a growing team. {product} offers transparent, affordable pricing to support your projects at every stage.

info.preview-features: Includes access to preview and beta features.

questions.caption: Questions?
questions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questions.description: Find answers to common questions about {product}. If you don’t see what you're looking for, feel free to reach out on GitHub.

1.title: Can I chat with someone if I have more questions?
1.description: Absolutely! For further inquiries, contact us at support@basestack.co. We're here to help!

2.title: Is there a discount for annual plans?
2.description: Yes! We offer annual discounts on all plans. Contact us for more details.

3.title: Is {product} available for free?
3.description: {product} has a free plan for solo developers and beginners. Try it out before upgrading to a paid plan.

4.title: Can I use Basestack's tools separately, and how is pricing structured?
4.description: Yes, each tool works independently with its own pricing. Pay only for what you need and choose different plans for each tool.

5.title: What’s your refund policy?
5.description: We offer a 15-day refund policy if you're not fully satisfied. After that, refunds may be considered under special circumstances. Our free tier lets you test everything before committing, and you can cancel anytime.

6.title: Which payment provider does Basestack use?
6.description: We use Lemon Squeezy to process payments securely. They handle transactions, tax compliance, and global payment methods, so you can focus on building with our tools.

7.title: What is Basestack, and who is it for?
7.description: Basestack is a set of open-source tools for developers, teams, and startups. Self-host for free or use our hosted plans for convenience.

8.title: Is Basestack really free?
8.description: Yes! Our open-source tools are free to self-host forever. You only pay if you choose our hosted plans, which offer additional convenience and support.

9.title: How do I get started with Basestack?
9.description: Getting started is easy: choose your tool, decide whether to self-host or use our hosted plans, and integrate it into your project. Our docs provide quick setup guides, or you can request a demo.

10.title: What’s the Feedback tool, and when will it be available?
10.description: Our upcoming Feedback tool helps collect user insights, similar to Canny. Sign up to get notified when it launches!

11.title: How secure is Basestack?
11.description: Security is our priority. Self-hosted gives you full control, while our hosted plans include request filtering and data encryption to protect your projects.

12.title: What kind of support do I get with Basestack?
12.description: Self-hosted users can access our community and documentation. Hosted plan users get priority support directly from our team—reach out anytime at support@basestack.com.

13.title: How does Basestack compare to competitors?
13.description: Basestack is open-source with flexible pricing. Use our tools separately or together, self-hosted or with our hosting—whatever works for you.

14.title: How often are Basestack tools updated?
14.description: We roll out regular updates to keep our tools up to date and secure. Self-hosted users can pull updates from our repo, while hosted users automatically receive updates.

15.title: Can I use Basestack with my existing tech stack?
15.description: Absolutely! Basestack integrates with most setups. Forms work with HTML or JS, Feature Flags can be used with any codebase, and our docs provide easy integration guides.

16.title: Is there a trial for hosted plans?
16.description: Try our free tier first. If you upgrade to a paid plan, you can cancel within 15 days for a full refund if it doesn't work for you.

17.title: Why offer both open-source and hosted options?
17.description: Open-source gives you full control with no cost, while hosted options offer convenience, support, and easy setup. You choose the best fit for your needs.
